name: Target Shooter (iCameron)
description:
Target shooter

Shoot Targets, Score Points, Dodge Projectiles, Dodge Lasers.

Shoot the Targets down before they transform into Enemies which will spawn hazards.

Be quick to kill - or else be shot from the freshly transformed enemy!

I put quite some effort in the game feel effects - so, I hope you enjoy! 

Controls & Tips

Kill the Green Targets to replenish health.

Aiming - Mouse - Gamepad Right Thumbstick

Movement - WASD - Gamepad LeftThumbstick

Shoot - Left Mouse Button - Gamepad Right Trigger/Shoulder

Zoom - Right Mouse Button -  Gamepad LeftTrigger/Shoulder

Jump - Spacebar - Gamepad all face buttons

Pause Menu - Esc / Q - Gamepad Start / Select

WARNING: No autoaim for controller - mouse recommended, good luck ;)

Used Unreal Starter Packs

- StarterContent

- ThirdPerson

- Paragon: Sparrow

Some sounds from Unreal Samples (Action RPG, Shooter Game)

Some words from the developer

I'm glad I was able to make a archer prototype come true during the GameJam as my first project. Used asset package Paragon: Sparrow by Epic Games - It's awesome to bring her back to life in a small prototype.

Over the course of the project I had to descope a lot . Initially I had more ideas for targets / power-ups / abilities / enemies / bosses / hazards.

So, we'll see if there's coming more in the future!

For now, enjoy some shooting!

Sincerely,

iCameron
